title: Video: A Look at Geraint Thomas’ Pinarello Dogma F Ahead of the Tour de France
content:
Geraint Thomas may have stayed on the same team for the past 18 years, but his bike has certainly changed.

Read the full article at Video: A Look at Geraint Thomas’ Pinarello Dogma F Ahead of the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
